description: Learn our clever hack to make instant pork meatballs. This speedy pesto pasta is super tasty and ready in 15 minutes, perfect for when you're short on time.
name: Pork, Fennel & Pea Gnocchi Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
500g Woolworths Italian style fennel pork sausages

recipeInstructions.text: Cook gnocchi according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Remove sausage from casings. Break into small pieces and add to pan. Cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Add peas, zest, pasta, reserved cooking liquid, pesto and two-thirds of the parmesan, then cook for 2 minutes or until heated through and combined.
Meanwhile, prepare salad according to packet instructions. Serve gnocchi with salad and topped with remaining parmesan.
